document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">As </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">if </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#28ff42">Sea </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">should </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5cffb4">part </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b4d0b4">show </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">further </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#28ff42">Sea </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">further </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">and </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Three </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">But </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#607cff">Presumption </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">be </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#eca078">Periods </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#28ff42">Seas </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7cf0ff">Unvisited </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7cf0ff">Shores </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Themselves </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5cffb4">Verge </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#28ff42">Seas </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">be </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7cf0ff">Eternity </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Those </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: As if the sea should part
